Sigh, the korean servers are really $!$^&%$&^@@).
From 9pm to 11pm I can hardly login a closed game. Even if I did, the lag
has killed me 4-5 times (other time I managed to quit/save when the lag
attacks). Actually the servers are not down, as the KNN koreans are
playing happily. Just tat Korean international connection sux like hell,
sigh.
Dunno it's it a blessing in diguise, Australia site have not received the
game yet. Wait till they rec'd, hehehe.

Ziltus

On Wednesday, 05 July, 2000 7:19 PM, Dexter Wong
[SMTP:dexterw@...] wrote:
> Having lag problem in Asian Realm server, but totally no lag in open
> server. Also most times cant create games in Realm, often got the dread
> "server down" message, but still able to join games(some) though. Due to
> this irritating thing I play on open server more often.
